name: quantum-secure-file-upload
description: A web-based secure file upload system with quantum-inspired encryption powered by Appwrite

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/angular && cp index.html styles.css app.js crypto.js appwrite-config.js appwrite-env.js.example README.md SETUP.md package.json appwrite.json .gitignore dist/angular/ || true
